name: PAX Gold
short_description: PAX Gold (PAXG) is a digital asset issued by Paxos. Each PAXG token is backed by one fine troy ounce (t oz) of a 400 oz London Good Delivery gold bar, stored in Brinkâ€™s vaults. Users that own PAXG will also own the underlying physical gold, held in custody by Paxos Trust Company.
